pullRequest.body:
Shows that the open and normal subgroups of a profinite group form a neighbourhood basis of the identity.

---

nodes.body: Almost all of those lemmas can go in less specialized files.

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion · exact IsOpen.preimage continuous_mul U_open · apply hv; simp ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion lemma openSubgroupContainsNormal (U : Subgroup G) (u_open : IsOpen (U : Set G)) ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion · constructor · exact intersectionOfConjugatesIsNormal U · have := iInf_le (fun g : ConjAct G => g • U) (1 : ConjAct G) ```

I added this auxiliary definition to split the proof of `clopenContainsOpenSubgroup` , but I suppose this definition has no other use. Is this still preferred over defining this in the body of `clopenContainsOpenSubgroup`? Can I somehow mark this as "private", i.e. should not be imported when importing the file?

pullRequest.title: feat(Topology/Algebra/Group): Normal open neighbourhood basis in profinite groups

nodes.body: Almost all of those lemmas can go in less specialized files.
